short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a tooltip when hovering over prices with the time that will take you to earn that amount.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you see how long it would take you to earn a certain amount of money when hovering over prices while browsing with a small tooltip.

TimePrices supports 4 currencies at the moment: USD, EUR, GBP and JPY.

You can configure your income in the settings, and blacklist or whitelist specific websites for the extension to run on.

TimePrices is free and open-source. Feel free to report issues or fork your own copy.
